name: Three Hours to Athens
description:
The marathon originates from the story of Pheidippides, a Greek messenger who ran 25 miles from the battlefield at Marathon to the city of Athens to deliver news of the Greek victory over the Persians. Finally, you can relive the experience in a historically-inaccurate endless runner. Will you be able to reach Athens?

Controls: Use the mouse button to press buttons. Press the spacebar to jump over obstacles.

This game was made over the week of 10/18/2020, the sixth in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
